## Source: ossf-package-analysis (afd6ea9666bf6ceb788814bf97d1d4e04d9d20bc715624d139e2da921b61c2d5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'decompopt' @ 912.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
